<Meta title="Customization/Dark mode"/>

# Dark mode

## How to?

Scaleway UI is designed to be used in both light and dark mode. The kit also provide both light and dark theme. <br />
You can enable dark mode by setting the `theme` prop to `dark` on the `ThemeProvider` component.

```tsx
import { ThemeProvider } from '@emotion/react'
import { theme, darkTheme, Button } from '@scaleway/ui'
import { useState } from 'react'

function App() {
  const [theme, setTheme] = useState(theme)

  return (
    <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
        <Button onClick={() => setTheme(darkTheme)}>
            Switch theme
        </Button>
    </ThemeProvider>
  )
}

export default App
```
